text: Tara sanghabad'dha haye tomadera birud'dhe yud'dha karabe na suraksita jana-basatira bhetare athaba de'oyala durgera arala theke byatita. Tadera nijedera madhye tadera sangharsa ati pracanda. Tumi tadera bhabate para aikyabad'dha, kinta tadera antara hacche bicchinna. E e'ijan'ya ye tara hacche emana eka jati yara bud'dhisud'dhi rakhe na.
